name: argyll
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area on the west coast of Scotland that was a county (= area with its own local government) until 1975: Temperatures will rise in the sunnier parts of northern Argyll.
More examplesFewer examplesWilliam McTaggart was the son of an Argyll crofter.A lethal, new form of algae pollution has been found in one of Scotland's best known lochs, Loch Awe in Argyll.In 1685 the castle was burnt by the Duke of Argyll and fell into ruin.a long journey by train from Argyll to Dorset
